item.title: BusinessHub - One page template
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

As I said before it’s nice, perhaps have a go at making a standard page (a page other than the home one) for this.

[quote=“John, post:3, topic:541647”][quote author=Ashi link=topic=660517.msg4416357#msg4416357 date=1396103998]
You should use and tags.

You’re slowly getting better at this
Good Job.
[/quote]
I’ve never heard of [tt][/tt], and I can’t find it on MDN either. Where did you hear about that element?[/quote]
I haven’t heard of that too, but there’s main, section and article at your disposal.

Read full topic

item.title: BusinessHub - One page template
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Preview: http://i.gyazo.com/dd18517bd3c1156a04b6a2cbe79d40b0.png

http://uppit.com/srf5j8vsg5vw/BusinessHub.zip

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    
    <head>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/style.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/shake.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/fontawesome/css/font-awesome.min.css">
        <title>BusinessHub</title>
    </head>
    
    <body>
        <header>
            <div class="wrapper">
                <div id="lefthead">	<span id="sitename"> <i class="fa fa-briefcase"></i> <a href="index.html">BusinessHub</a></span>

                </div>
                <div id="righthead">Questions? <a href="#">Send us a support ticket.</a>

                </div>
            </div>
        </header>
        <nav>
            <div id="navwrap">	<a href="#">
    			<div class="block" id="yellow">
    				<H3>The Team</H3>
    				<H5>Learn who we are and why we're here</H5>
    			</div>
    		</a>
	<a href="#">
    			<div class="block" id="red">
    				<H3>Products & Pricing</H3>
    				<H5>See what we have to offer</H5>
    			</div>
    		</a>
	<a href="#">
    			<div class="block" id="blue">
    				<H3>Donate</H3>
    				<H5>Show a thank-you for our efforts</H5>
    			</div>
    		</a>
	<a href="#">
    			<div class="block" id="turq">
    				<H3>Deal of the month</H3>
    				<H5>Take a look at our monthly discount</H5>
    			</div>
    		</a>

            </div>
        </nav>
        <div id="content">
            <div class="wrapper">
                <p id="big">This <span style="font-weight: bolder;">is a slogan</span> and a catchy slogan will go here.</p>
                <hr />
                <div class="container">
                    <div class="top">
                        <div class="shake shake-slow"><i class="fa fa-code"></i>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="title">Efficient code</div>
                    <div class="description">We use only the most efficient code for our products. Contact us with any questions you've got.</div>
                </div>
                <div class="container">
                    <div class="top">
                        <div class="shake shake-slow"><i class="fa fa-money"></i>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="title">Great pricing</div>
                    <div class="description">All of our products are low-cost and affordable. Want to negotiate a price? Send us a support ticket.</div>
                </div>
                <div class="container">
                    <div class="top">
                        <div class="shake shake-slow"><i class="fa fa-comments"></i>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="title">Great support</div>
                    <div class="description">Our team is ready to assist you with any issue you may have. We're qualified to help anyone at any time.</div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div id="imagearea">
            <div class="wrapper">
                <div id="bigpicture">
                    <img src="http://placehold.it/600x550" alt="big picture">
                </div>
                <div id="pictext">
                    <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </body>

</html>
html {
    width: 100%;
    overflow-x: hidden;
}
body {
    width: 100%;
    position: absolute;
}
header {
    background-image: url('img/header.png');
    background-repeat: repeat;
    width: 100%;
    margin: -8px 0 0 -8px;
    height: 125px;
}
.wrapper {
    width: 940px;
    min-width: 940px;
    margin: 0 auto 0 auto;
}
#lefthead {
    float: left;
}
#sitename, #sitename a {
    font-family: Athelas;
    color: #000;
    font-size: 40px;
    line-height: 350%;
    transition: all .4s linear;
    -moz-transition: opacity .4s linear;
    -webkit-transition: opacity .4s linear;
    text-decoration: none;
}
#sitename:hover {
    opacity: .5;
}
#righthead {
    float: right;
    font-size: 13px;
    color: #000;
    line-height: 1100%;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: bold;
}
#righthead a {
    color: inherit;
}
nav {
    background-image: url('img/header.png');
    width: 100%;
    min-width: 1000px;
    height: 85px;
    margin: 0 auto 0 -8px;
}
#navwrap {
    margin: 0 auto 0 -480px;
    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
}
.block {
    float: left;
    width: 236px;
    height: 85px;
    opacity: 1;
    transition: all .4s linear;
    -moz-transition: opacity .4s linear;
    -webkit-transition: opacity .4s linear;
}
.block:hover {
    opacity: 0.7;
}
#yellow {
    background: #CAB75B;
}
#red {
    background: #CB654C;
}
#blue {
    background: #078FA9;
}
#turq {
    background: #90CABE;
}
.block H3 {
    color: #F0F0F0;
    margin: 0 0 0 10px;
    line-height: 280%;
}
.block H5 {
    color: #F0F0F0;
    margin: 0 0 0 10px;
    line-height: 100%;
}
#content {
    background: #0B89A2;
    width: 100%;
    height: 73.5vh;
    margin: -60px 0 0 -8px;
}
#big {
    font-family: Athelas;
    font-size: 60px;
    text-align: justify;
    color: #ecf0f1;
    padding: 30px;
}
#content hr {
    opacity: .4;
    color: #bdc3c7;
    width: 650px;
    margin-top: -50px;
}
.container {
    margin-left: 46px;
    width: 250px;
    height: auto;
    font-family: Abraham Lincoln;
    color: #ecf0f1;
    display: inline-block;
    text-align: center;
}
.container .top {
    font-size: 60px;
}
.container .title {
    font-size: 40px;
    font-weight: bolder;
}
.container .description {
    font-size: 190%;
    text-align: justify;
}
#imagearea {
    background: #16a085;
    width: 100%;
    height: 94vh;
    margin: 0 0 0 -8px;
    padding-top: 40px;
}
#bigpicture {
    float: left;
    border: 2px #0B89A2 solid;
    width: 600px;
    height: 550px;
}
#bigpicture:hover img {
    opacity: 0.9;
}
#pictext {
    float: right;
    font-family: Athelas;
    color: #ecf0f1;
    width: 315px;
    font-size: 25.5px;
    text-align: justify;
}

Some of the code may be a bit redundant, but other than that I’d appreciate some feedback.

Read full topic
